title: The.Grudge.2.SweSub.DVDRip.XviD-JESS.avi   -Horror
description:
Plot Summary for 
The Grudge 2 (2006) 
Set within two years after the first film and between two countries. Karen&#039;s sister, Audrey, been affected by the supernatural curse, and trying to find the origin of it in order to find a way to free herself. But what has this quest got to do with the families who are living in Chicago, a photojournalist from Hong Kong,and the three schoolgirls from Tokyo&#039;s International High School?
